header.title: CYCLOMANCY – The Secret of Psychic Power Control

central_thesis: The book posits that all individuals possess dormant, innate psychic powers, collectively termed the 'Primitive Autoconscious,' which, when systematically awakened and controlled through specific mental and physical exercises, can manifest as 'miracles' across all aspects of life, including enhanced abilities, healing, influencing others, and even manipulating physical reality.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON ONE: How the Fantastic Potential of Your Primitive Autoconscious Can Work for You
structure_content.summary: Introduces the concept of the 'Primitive Autoconscious' as an instinctive, prehistoric mind endowed with profound psychic and muscular control, which modern man has largely lost. It offers 'scientific proofs' (drawing from observed phenomena like syphilis and hysteria) for the mind's ability to alter the body. The lesson outlines the ten key anatomical parts of the Primitive Autoconscious and asserts that developing even 1% of this hidden potential can lead to a 109-fold increase in personal effectiveness and the ability to perform 'incredible results'.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON TWO: How to Put Your Conscious Mind, Your Sensations Recording Center and Your Organs Control Center Under Psychic Power Control
structure_content.summary: Focuses on developing a 'psychic power command drive' to exert control over one's conscious mind, sensations, and autonomous bodily functions. It presents a series of exercises, such as using hot and cold water or timing tasks, designed to train the conscious mind to accept psychic commands over logical reasoning. The goal is to intensify the psychic command to a point where it can compel significant physiological and mental changes, laying the groundwork for influencing others.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON THREE: How to Put Your Muscle Coordination Center Under Psychic Power Control
structure_content.summary: Explores how to unleash the 'dynamite of protoplasmic irritability' within the Muscle Coordination Center to achieve exceptional muscular power, endurance, physical grace, and allure. The lesson details the physiological mechanisms of muscle coordination during physical exertion and provides tailored exercises for men (e.g., enhancing athletic performance) and women (e.g., acquiring the grace of a fashion model), enabling them to perform physical feats without extensive training.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON FOUR: How to Put Your Resisting Nerve Gap Under Psychic Power Control
structure_content.summary: Explains the role of 'Nerve Gaps' (synapses) as points of resistance in neural transmission and introduces the 'Psychic Arc' as a technique to overcome this resistance. The Psychic Arc involves intensely thinking the opposite of a negative thought for a brief period to 'saturate' nerve gaps with acetylcholine, speeding up message transmission. It describes the 'All-Over Psychic Arc' for widespread systemic influence and the 'Delayed Psychic Arc' for eradicating undesirable habits, thereby accelerating reflexes and enhancing psychic projection.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON FIVE: How to Put the Nerve Electricity in Your Brain and Body Under Psychic Power Control
structure_content.summary: Discusses the body's inherent 'nerve electricity' and its 'cerebral links' as foundational to psychic phenomena. It elaborates on how strong psychic commands induce chemical and electrical changes in the body, which, in turn, affect one's aura. Practical exercises include the 'Electrifying Handshake' to uplift others' moods, the 'Electron Restorer' to counter discouragement and rebalance body electrons, and methods to 'cement in' new skills by forming robust cerebral links.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON SIX: How to Multiply Your Energy with Psychic Power Control
structure_content.summary: Focuses on augmenting physical and mental energy through specialized breathing techniques. It introduces the 'Horizontal Ozona' (deep breathing while reclining) and the 'Stooping Zembla' (deep breathing while stooping) as means to maximize oxygen intake, store electrons, and prevent fatigue. These practices are presented not only as methods for physical revitalization but also as crucial for psychosomatic healing and overall psychic power enhancement.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON SEVEN: How 'Never to Get Tired' by Putting Your Muscle Tone Under Psychic Power Control
structure_content.summary: Details methods for prolonging muscle tone indefinitely to achieve tireless physical endurance. It introduces 'Selective Muscle Tone Control' to overcome awkwardness and 'Muscle Rhythm' to optimize energy expenditure in all physical activities. Exercises guide practitioners to consciously command their muscles to feel firm or soft, control heart rate, and execute movements with perfect timing and grace, thereby mastering their physical body's capabilities.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON EIGHT: How to Use the Astounding Power of Your Brain Horns and Put It Under Psychic Power Control
structure_content.summary: Explains the 'Brain Horns' (optic nerves and retina) as a psychic artillery for both projecting and receiving psychic power. It categorizes brain waves into Alpha, Beta, Delta, Theta, and Gamma, linking them to different states of mind and levels of psychic activity. The lesson describes how brain waves are converted into radiant heat, infrared rays, and radiowaves, which can then be projected outwards to influence others, emphasizing the immense power of infrared ray projections.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON NINE: How to Put Your Seeing and Hearing Reflexes Under Psychic Power Control
structure_content.summary: Addresses the development of superior sensory reflexes, specifically 'Seeing Reflexes' (Superior Colliculi) and 'Hearing Reflexes' (Inferior Colliculi). It outlines exercises to enhance these reflexes for applications in sports, social interactions (e.g., flirting), and self-protection. The lesson details how to 'give muscles ears' to detect faint sounds through physical sensation, indicating an advanced level of sensory control.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON TEN: How to Put Your Primitive Seeing Center and Your Highest Visual Center Under Psychic Power Control
structure_content.summary: Focuses on developing the 'Primitive Seeing Center' (external geniculate body) and the 'Highest Visual Center' (occipital lobes) to achieve extraordinary vision. Exercises are provided to enhance reading speed, discern distant objects, perceive color with greater artistic precision, and even influence the 'negative after-images' in others' minds. The concept of 'Intermolecular Vision' is introduced, allowing for the psychic ability to see through solid matter.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON ELEVEN: How to Put Your Primitive Hearing Center Under Psychic Power Control
structure_content.summary: Explores the cultivation of 'hyperacuity' in hearing through the 'Primitive Hearing Center' (medial geniculate body) and the unique phenomenon of 'Cochlear Electricity.' It distinguishes Cochlear Electricity from true auditory nerve electricity and outlines exercises to expand audible range and sensitivity. The lesson suggests that with sufficient psychic control, one can perceive sounds that are normally inaudible and even 'hear' with other body parts, such as muscles, through physical sensation.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON TWELVE: How to Use Autoconscious Healing to Bring Others Under Psychic Power Control
structure_content.summary: Presents a four-step method for 'Autoconscious Healing,' emphasizing the establishment of rapport, projection of infrared rays, transfer of body electron surplus through touch, and vivid visualization of healed organs. It introduces specific techniques such as the 'Torso Cure' for general ailments and the 'Visualized Cured Organ' for targeting specific physical conditions, positioning these as powerful means to influence health in others.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON THIRTEEN: How to Do the Seemingly Impossible with Your Body Electricity and Your Brain Horns
structure_content.summary: Introduces advanced psychic feats like creating a 'Human Lamp' (emitting visible light) and utilizing the 'Psychic Antidrom' (reversing nerve electricity flow). The underlying principle is 'Molecular Action,' which asserts that all matter is composed of constantly moving molecules influenced by mental commands. The lesson explains how to manipulate the temperature and pressure of psychic projections to affect physical substances, even suggesting the dissolution of clouds as an achievable miracle.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON FOURTEEN: How to Develop—and Gain Unbelievably from—Psychic Power Vision
structure_content.summary: Details the '6 Means' of achieving 'Psychic Power Vision,' which include manipulating eye lens convexity, eyeball convergence, pupil size, and the ability to 'peep through the inter-molecular ether.' Exercises are provided to develop a 'Psychic Power Vision Magnifier' for extreme near vision and 'Distant Vision' for far-off objects. It briefly describes the 5th and 6th advanced means (elongating/shortening the eyeball and moving the eye lens) as skills reserved for true psychic masters.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON FIFTEEN: How to Develop—and Gain Stupendously—from Psychic Power Hearing
structure_content.summary: Expands on developing 'Psychic Power Hearing' through the combined intensification of 'Cochlear Electricity' and the 'All Over Psychic Arc.' It outlines exercises designed to increase auditory sensitivity to detect faint and distant sounds, even those typically drowned out by other noises ('unmasking'). The ultimate goal is to enable the practitioner to perceive sounds with extraordinary acuity, extending to the ability to 'hear' through physical sensation, effectively 'giving muscles ears'.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON SIXTEEN: How to Put Your Aura and Its Power of Psychometry Under Psychic Power Control
structure_content.summary: Defines the 'aura' as a foggy-like electromagnetic extension of the body, influenced by mental states, brain waves, and body chemistry. It introduces 'Psychometry' as the ability to extract past information from objects by 'sensitizing' to their imprinted aura. The 'Psychic Harpoon' is presented as a method to project one's aura to influence others psychically. Exercises involve blanking the conscious mind and drawing information from the object's aura, as well as projecting the aura to 'touch' and influence distant individuals.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON SEVENTEEN: How to Develop and Use Your Astral Senses for Psychic Power Control
structure_content.summary: Introduces 'astral senses' and the 'astral body' as super-physical means for perceiving and interacting with the astral plane. It describes the 'Astral Tube' as a device for sending and receiving psychic messages over vast distances, the 'Astral Microscope' for seeing through objects, and the 'Astral Telescope' for distant vision. The chapter also covers the development of 'X-Ray Eyes' for seeing through bodies and 'Astral Hearing' for perceiving distant voices, providing exercises for each of these astral tools.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON EIGHTEEN: How to Extract Profitable Knowledge from the Physio-Astral World with Psychic Power Control
structure_content.summary: Presents the concept of 'Earth Records' – imprints of past and future events in the ether – as an alternative to Akashic Records. It explains 'Clairvoyance of the Past and Future' as the ability to attune one's 'Psychic Power Center' to these records. Exercises are designed to develop 'Right Receptivity' through deep concentration, visualization, and mental commands, allowing practitioners to 'foresee' future events and gain profitable knowledge, including using 'Crystal Gazing' as an aid.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON NINETEEN: How to Use the Secrets of Psychic Power Domination to Control Others at Will
structure_content.summary: Focuses on techniques for mental domination, primarily through the 'Outcurving Astral Cone' (a psychic power projection) and the 'Psychic Harpoon.' Exercises teach how to project one's psychic influence to attract and compel others, assert control in social and business situations, and defend against negative psychic attacks by constructing an 'Aural Helmet.' It also introduces advanced methods like 'Astral Body Traveling' and 'Personalized Astral Thought Forms' for remote influence and communication.

structure_content.chapter_title: LESSON TWENTY: How to Put the Physio-Astral World Under Psychic Power Control and Acquire Miraculous Power
structure_content.summary: Consolidates all previous teachings, detailing how to achieve ultimate 'miraculous power.' It covers advanced abilities such as 'Induced Vision' (making others perceive what you visualize), 'Telekinesis' (moving objects with an extended astral arm), 'Materialization' (creating physical forms from astral substance), and 'Levitation' (lifting the body via astral extensions or 'Reversed Magnetization'). The chapter concludes with a 'Step-by-Step Method' for daily practice, aiming to keep the 'Primitive Autoconscious' permanently awakened and in full control.

key_concepts.definition: Another name for 'White Magic,' defined as the systematic use of hidden psychic powers inherent in all individuals.

The 'instinctive, prehistoric' mind within every human, composed of ten specific brain parts, which holds dormant, staggering psychic and muscular control abilities. Awakening even 1% of it can multiply effectiveness 109 times.
The first and most important part of the Primitive Autoconscious, located in the 'Silent Area' of the brain (forehead and temples), responsible for initiating psychic commands.
A mental directive originating from the Psychic Power Center, intended to incite specific actions or changes in the body or external reality, overriding conscious limitations.
The 'concealed dynamite' within nerve tissue, an electrical potential that generates an electric current when stimulated, crucial for transmitting psychic commands.
A point of resistance in nerve pathways that messages must cross. Psychic power aims to reduce this resistance for faster and more potent transmission.

A technique to overcome mental or physiological resistance at Nerve Gaps by intensely thinking the opposite of a current negative thought or situation for a brief duration, thereby 'saturating' the gaps with conducive neurochemicals.
An intensified Psychic Arc that extends its influence throughout the entire nervous system, creating a widespread psychic response to achieve comprehensive control or healing.
A technique used to permanently eradicate undesirable habits or compulsions by repeatedly applying the Psychic Arc with an opposite thought into the 'final common pathway' of the nervous system.
The self-generated electrical current of nerve tissue, distinct from inorganic electricity, that carries messages and commands throughout the brain and body.
A unit of knowledge, training, or habit embedded in the brain through repeated transmission of messages or commands over specific nerve pathways.
A deep breathing exercise performed while lying down, designed to maximize oxygen intake and electron storage in the body, used for rapid energy recuperation and psychosomatic healing.
A deep breathing exercise performed while stooping, aimed at fully inflating the lungs to take in maximum oxygen and electrons, particularly effective for quickly regaining energy when exhausted.
The ability, developed through psychic power, to consciously regulate the contraction and relaxation of muscles, leading to enhanced physical endurance, grace, and overcoming awkwardness.
The perfection of muscle coordination and timing in physical activities, achieved through psychic control, to minimize energy waste and maximize efficiency of movement.
Referred to as the 'psychic power artillery,' primarily consisting of the optic nerves and retina, used for both projecting and receiving psychic energy and commands.

Electrical activities of the brain, categorized into Alpha (subconscious), Beta (conscious), Delta (Psychic Power Center), Theta (Psychic Power), and Gamma (Deep Psychic Power), each with specific frequencies and voltages indicative of mental states.

A newly discovered form of body electricity generated in the cochlea by sound waves, distinct from auditory nerve electricity, linked to phenomena of hyperacuity and controllable through psychic power.
A 'spirit or ghost-like double' of the human body, exact in size and shape, capable of temporary separation from the physical body, and composed of body emissions (gases, heat, radiation, magnetism).
Super-physical senses that enable contact with the astral plane, distinct from physical senses, and crucial for clairvoyance, psychometry, and astral travel.
A psychic construct formed in the air or ether, acting as a direct channel for intensified psychic power commands and photons, used for transmitting and receiving psychic impressions over distances.
A psychic construct of two astral lenses enclosed within an Astral Tube, enabling the practitioner to see through any object or matter.
A psychic construct of two astral lenses within an Astral Tube, allowing for vision over limitless distances, detecting auras, emotions, and thoughts remotely.
The ability to see through solid objects, particularly human bodies, by projecting powerful photons (X-rays) from the Brain Horns through a 'Sawed-Off Astral Half Cone'.
A focused projection of one's aura or psychic energy towards another person or object, used to influence, startle, or affect them remotely.
The ability to discern the past history of an object by holding it, achieved by attuning oneself to the 'Molecular Action' or residual aura imprinted on the object.
Imprints of past and future events (light rays, sound waves, combined forms) existing in the ether close to Earth, serving as a record of all occurrences, distinct from the Akashic Records.
The attuned mental state required to contact and interpret the 'Earth Records' of the past or future, often aided by specific visualizations and mental preparation.
The ability to foresee future events by contacting and interpreting the 'Earth Records of the Future' with a developed 'Right Receptivity'.

A psychic projection of one's aura, shaped like an outward-curving cone, used to create a 'Dominating Psychic Atmosphere' that attracts receptive minds and spreads influence over a significant radius.
A psychic construct of an aural sphere formed around the head, acting as a protective defense against the psychic power domination radiowaves or insidious thoughts of others.
An advanced psychic feat involving the temporary separation of the astral body from the physical body, allowing for remote presence, perception, and influence over distances.
Projected mental images of oneself that retain a conscious connection with the sender, capable of appearing before others and transmitting communications or information remotely.
The ability to project visualized images from one's own retina into another person's brain, making them 'see' what the practitioner intends, even if it is not physically present.
The movement of physical objects without direct physical contact, achieved by projecting an 'astral arm' from the astral body to manipulate objects.
The ability to create temporary physical forms or objects from astral substance, often manifesting as an extension of the practitioner's astral body.
The act of lifting one's physical body into the air without any physical support, achieved either through extensions of the astral body or by 'Reversed Magnetization'.
The voluntary alteration of the body's magnetic polarity to match that of the Earth, causing the body to be repelled and thus levitate.

A technique to ensure the permanent awakening and full control of the Primitive Autoconscious by consciously subduing lower brain waves (Alpha, Beta) and bringing higher brain waves (Delta, Theta) and Cochlear Electricity into control.

practical_system.description: The Cyclomancy system is a comprehensive, progressive training regimen designed to awaken and control the 'Primitive Autoconscious' – the source of all psychic power. It operates on the principle of 'Psychic Power Commands,' which are intense mental directives, bolstered by specific visualizations and physiological manipulations, to overcome conscious limitations and directly influence bodily functions and external reality. The system systematically develops various psychic faculties, from basic sensory control to advanced astral and telekinetic abilities, all framed within a quasi-scientific explanation of nerve electricity, brain waves, and molecular action.
tools: Magazines or newspapers with fashion model pictures
Small yellow cards (for negative after images)
Crystal ball or shiny reflective object (as a substitute)
rituals: The 'Three Steps for Driving Psychic Power into Any Part of Your Body': Give a command in the conscious mind, drive it from the forehead through the nerve to the target part, then implant the command to incite action (p. 22-23).

Exercises for 'Ordering Your Conscious Mind with Psychic Power Commands': Place hand in cool water, command it to feel warm, then intensify the command with 'warmer' rockets, repeating for gradual warming and later for cooling the other hand, and performing both simultaneously with divided attention (p. 27-28).

The 'Silent Drive' for 'Psychic Power Command Drive Fast': Sit, close eyes, think of left hand, drive a 'hot psychic power command rocket' from forehead through Sensations Recording Center to left hand, simultaneously block normal temperature sensations, and continue to intensify the feeling of heat (p. 29).
Exercises for 'Developing Your Timing with Psychic Power Control': Estimate exact time without analysis, then verify. Estimate reading time for pages, then verify (p. 30).

Exercises for 'Intensifying Your Power of Volition': Pick an exact time to go to bed and force yourself to adhere to it without deviation. Compel yourself to write a specific length letter within a time limit calmly (p. 31-32).

Exercises for 'Keener Thinking for Psychic Power Control': Read 'deep' books fluently, spontaneously affixing meaning to unknown words and absorbing information, starting with two-thirds of a page and gradually increasing (p. 32-33).

Exercises for 'Developing Psychic Power Control Over Your Muscle Coordination Center': For men, refuse to believe muscle fatigue and project psychic commands to surpass physical limits in sports. For women, imitate fashion model poses with precision, gliding between them to develop grace and compelling mood (p. 43-45).

The 'Psychic Arc' for 'Reducing Resistance at the Nerve Gap': When faced with a frightening situation, think of something calming for two seconds, stop, then repeat, intensifying the opposite thought with a psychic power command rocket until it rushes across Nerve Gaps faster than the original thought (p. 48).

The 'All-Over Psychic Arc': For warding off antagonism, contemplate a delicious dish (e.g., juicy steak) for two seconds, stop, then repeat, intensifying the contemplation until mouth waters, hands feel warm, feet feel warm, stomach feels warm, chest feels warm, legs feel warm, neck feels warm (p. 55).

The 'Delayed Psychic Arc' for 'Obliterating an Undesirable Habit': Allow the undesirable thought to enter, maintain for fifteen seconds, then drive a strong 'Psychic Arc' with the opposite thought for two seconds, relax two seconds, repeat three more times (p. 56).

The 'Electrifying Handshake': To restore someone's happy frame of mind, take a deep breath, fill self with electrons, apply 'Psychic Arc' to feel happy/contented, smile, grasp their hand, and discharge a 'psychic power command bursting alive with electrons' into them (p. 64).
The 'Electron Restorer': To combat discouragement, visualize a deeply desired dream vividly as coming true, reinforcing with a psychic power command rocket (p. 65).

The 'Horizontal Ozona': When fatigued, lie on back with feet flat and knees flexed, relax abdominal muscles, inhale normally filling an imaginary empty tube from lower ribs to chest, then neck/shoulders, exhale naturally; repeat 5-6 times. Relax 20 seconds before getting up (p. 69-70).

The 'Stooping Zembla': Stand with legs apart, toes out, bend knees and stoop, resting hands on knees. Take several deep breaths, filling thorax from diaphragm to neck. Pause 8-10 seconds, straighten up (p. 70).
Exercises to Prolong Your Muscle Tone: Trot/run, when tired, command 'NOT tired' with psychic rocket, continue, apply 'Psychic Arc' to forget fatigue, then sprint (p. 79).

Exercises to Control Muscle Tone at Will: In morning, send psychic rocket to feel 'firm and hard muscled'. Later, send rockets to divest all muscle tone to feel 'soft and flabby'. Then regain tone (p. 87).

Exercises for Muscle Tone Control of Your Heart: After exercise, stoop and use 'Stooping Zembla,' send psychic rocket to heart to relax and shrink to normal size. While exercising, send rocket to slow heart down, then to beat slightly faster but flexibly (p. 86).
Building the 'Aural Helmet': Sit quietly, close eyes. Visualize aura spreading upwards, enclosing head in a six-inch thick sphere with an irregular, saw-toothed outer surface (p. 193).

The 'Psychic Harpoon': To influence someone, stare intently, visualize aura around them like a thick sack. Apply 'All Over Psychic Arc' to yourself, draw skin-heat to Brain Horns, project two infrared ray hot rods (reinforced with photon power) from Brain Horns into their aura until it 'touches' them (p. 154).

Exercises for 'Psychic Power Vision Magnifier' (Near Vision): Stare at a letter, project psychic command rocket to Highest Visual Center to 'magnify' it, reinforce with second rocket to Organs Control Center to stimulate loving nerves with 'Psychic Arc' (juicy steak thought) (p. 148).

Exercises for 'Psychic Power Vision Magnifier' (Distant Vision): Stare at distant object, command Highest Visual Center to 'magnify' it, reinforce with second rocket to Organs Control Center to stimulate fighting nerves with 'Violent Arc' (enraging thought) (p. 148).

The 'Honeycomb Exercise' (Intermolecular Vision): Punch holes in cardboard, tape to dark surface. Sit back, stare through holes until they look like one dark surface. Apply 'Psychic Power Double Command' to Highest Visual Center (magnify image) and Organs Control Center (stimulate fighting nerves with 'Violent Arc') to make holes reappear (p. 150).

Exercises for 'Developing Your Cochlear Electricity' (Hyperacuity): Sit alone, ears plugged with cotton. Listen faintly heard sounds (e.g., clock ticking), 'force ears to hear it just as loudly' by sending an 'auditory psychic power command rocket' to multiply Cochlear Electricity, follow with 'All Over Psychic Arc' (p. 125-126).

The 'Torso Cure': Visualize recipient's torso (head to thighs) secreting acetylcholine at every Nerve Gap, or visualize a juicy steak while thinking of their torso. Maintain thought for two seconds (p. 129).

The 'Visualized Cured Organ': Visualize a healthy red liver (or other organ) floating in air. With a psychic power command rocket, implant it into the ailing side of the recipient's body, replacing the ailing organ (p. 131).

The 'Psychic Antidrom' for 'Kindling Fires of a Cooling Wife/Husband': Send a smashing psychic power command rocket to spouse's Sensations Recording Center to convert 'coolness' to 'ardent desire,' causing an antidromic effect driving desire back along nerves to skin (p. 136-137).

Creating a 'Human Lamp': Immerse one hand in very cool water, send psychic power command rocket to Sensations Recording Center to convert coolness to intense heat, causing an antidromic effect back to the hand, creating intense heat (p. 136).

Exercises for 'How to Find Out Where Your Best Friend/Romance Friend Went Last Night': Sit/lie quietly, relax. Visualize them as seen last night, reproduce the parting scene. Then imagine becoming them, thinking and feeling what they did to tune into their released combined-forms (p. 181).

Exercises for 'How to Find Out Beforehand What Your Best Friend/Romance Friend Will Do Tonight': Sit/lie quietly, relax. Visualize them as they will probably be/feel tonight, assume it's happening. Shift concentration to probable actions (p. 182).
Crystal Gazing: Stare lazily at a crystal or shiny object for 2-3 minutes. Try to 'see' familiar faces or scenes in it. Maintain quiet and serious demeanor (p. 184).

The 'Outcurving Astral Cone' for 'Attracting Specific Necessary Knowledge': Sit, visualize trying problem, formulate into exact words. From Psychic Power Center, fire words as radiowaves through Outcurving Aural Cone, spreading a psychic quarter-sphere of 10-15 miles. Turn about-face, repeat (p. 191).

Building 'Personalized Astral Thought Forms': Concentrate intently on a person, visualize yourself watching them, observing every detail. Construct an accurate, objective picture of them and their activity (p. 198).

Astral Body Traveling: Lie quietly in bed, eyes shut. Picture astral body filling every part of physical body. Deliver psychic power command rocket to astral body, ordering it to prepare to separate and appear before target (p. 196).
Creating the 'Giant Astral Suction-Cup': Create a 7-foot diameter suction-cup from aura, hover above body, imagine it drawing astral body out of physical body (p. 197).

Materializing an 'Astral Part into a Physical Part': Sit, relax. Reach out thinned astral arm to object. With psychic power command, objectify end of arm into a normal hand, picking up the object. Visualize hairs, skin, nails, joints (p. 205).

Levitation through 'Reversed Magnetization' (Falling Asleep): Lie flat on back, think to your back that it 'LOVES lying on this bed' and is a 'permanent part of it' to acquire magnetic polarity like the bed. Relax deeply (p. 210).

relevant_quotes.text: This book shows you how you may develop amazing mystical powers. Powers of healing, powers of materialization, powers of prophecy and thought transference-and others even more startling. It clearly proves that Magic really exists, and shows how-without so much as lifting a finger-incredible results may be achieved!
CYCLOMANCY (another name for White Magic) is simply the use of certain hidden powers that we all possess. Powers given to us long before books were invented. Forgotten powers.

You already know that your Primitive Autoconscious is your unknown self. But you don't have to awaken your Primitive Autoconscious completely. Just develop (or awaken) your unknown self by no more than 1% and you will be converted into a miracle among men.
Psychometry is the ability to tell the history of a strange object through psychic means.
Astral body traveling is one of the foremost achievements of psychic power development, and it is obviously an unsurpassed tool for psychic power domination.

"Miracles" are possible to execute because all life, both living and "non-living," are one... Since CYCLOMANCY: THE SECRET OF PSYCHIC POWER CONTROL seeks mainly a scientific understanding of all mystery, it will call the One, Molecular Action.

critical_analysis.relevance: Frank Rudolph Young's 'CYCLOMANCY' is a significant, albeit pseudoscientific, contribution to 20th-century popular occultism and self-help literature. It exemplifies a common trend of attempting to rationalize and systematize esoteric concepts (like astral projection, psychometry, and mind influence) using scientific-sounding, albeit ultimately unfounded, physiological explanations (e.g., nerve electricity, brain waves, protoplasmic irritability). Its detailed, step-by-step approach to 'psychic power control' aligns with the pragmatic and results-oriented focus of New Thought movements, seeking tangible 'miracles' through mental discipline. The book's dedication to the author's father (John Arnold Young) highlights a personal journey of exploration and compilation rather than a strictly academic one.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The book targets individuals seeking self-empowerment and practical advantages in everyday life through the cultivation of latent psychic abilities. Its appeal is to those who desire 'miraculous' results in areas such as health, wealth, social influence, romantic success, and even physical feats, without recourse to traditional supernatural or religious frameworks. The systematic, exercise-based format suggests a readership that values a structured, actionable approach to personal development, often with an underlying belief in hidden human potential.
